message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first before I put it on the general market. I think it would be a great fit for you. I'm asking for $12,000. What do you think?

Thank you for considering my offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $10,000 for the item. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
